sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"瘦的"之意。
means: lean ： 侧重缺少脂肪。既可能是因病而瘦，也可能因饥饿而消瘦。也指身体消瘦，但肌肉结实，身体健康。
slender ： 指身体细长、体态优美、苗条适中，多用于指女性。
slim ： 指身体的细长，体重轻不着重外形的优美，可用于不同的性别，常用于减轻体重的人。
thin ： 普通用词，指腰细、骨架窄，常因疾病或疲劳而消瘦。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... slide n. 幻灯片，滑道 slight a. 轻微的，细小的 slim a. 苗条的，纤细的.
高二英语词汇表 ... tip vt. 使倾斜;使翻倒;轻击 slight adj. 轻微的;少量的;纤细的 chest n. 胸腔;胸膛.
大学英语精读单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... slightly ad. 稍微地 slight n. 轻微的，微小的 motion vi. 打手势；点(或摇)头示意.
大学英语自学教程 - 豆丁网 ... rare a. 稀有的,难得的 slight a. 轻微的,纤细的 carbon n. 碳.

list.abs: GIA证书上的钻石荧光分级 ... faint( 微弱)， very slight( 非常微弱)， slight( 微弱)，.
风的级数是怎样衡量的？_百度知道 ... 软风 light breeze 轻风 slight breeze 微风 gentle breeze.
24节气用英语怎么说？_百度知道 ... 22.冬至 Winter solstice 23.小寒 Slight cold 二十四节气The 24  Solar Terms.
生活英语单词大全 - 豆丁网 ... 顽痛 Persistent Pain 轻痛 Slight Pain 血尿 Bloody Urine.

lj.lj_ly: he didn't mind in the slightest.
I don't have the slightest idea.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English; the adjective from Old Norse sléttr 'smooth' (an early sense in English), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch slechts 'merely' and German schlicht 'simple', schlecht 'bad'; the verb (originally in the sense 'make smooth or level'), from Old Norse slétta. The sense ‘treat with disrespect’ dates from the late 16th cent

encyclopedia.content: 基本介绍 adj. 轻微的，少量的；脆弱的；纤细的；细长的；不重要的 [ 比较级slighter 最高级slightest ] vt. 轻视，忽略；怠慢 n. 怠慢；轻蔑 英英释义： adj. 1. having little substance or significanceslight evidence 2. almost no or (with `a') at least some; very littlethere's slight chance that it will work there's a slight chance it will work 3. being of delicate or slender buildwatched her slight figure

entry.def: Something that is slight is very small in degree or quantity.

example.ex: Doctors say he has made a slight improvement...
example.tran: 医生说他的病情稍有好转。
我们有一个小小的问题。

entry.def: A slight person has a fairly thin and delicate looking body.

example.ex: She is smaller and slighter than Christie.

example.tran: 身材瘦小、戴着眼镜的人

entry.def: If you are slighted, someone does or says something that insults you by treating you as if your views or feelings are not important.

example.ex: They felt slighted by not being adequately consulted.
example.tran: 没有充分征求他们的意见，这让他们感到被冷落了。

entry.tran: (用于加强陈述的否定语气)一点也(不)
entry.def: You use in the slightest to emphasize a negative statement.

example.ex: That doesn't interest me in the slightest...
example.tran: 那一点也不能引起我的兴趣。

example.ex: 'Do you worry about ageing?' — 'Not in the slightest.'

means.word_mean: 1. a deliberate discourteous act (usually as an expression of anger or disapproval)
2. almost no or (with `a') at least some; very little;

sentences.sentence: "there's slight chance that it will work"
"there's a slight chance it will work"

means.word_mean: 3. being of delicate or slender build;

sentences.sentence: "she was slender as a willow shoot is slender"- Frank Norris
"a slim girl with straight blonde hair"
"watched her slight figure cross the street"

auth_sentence.content: Sadly, the songs here are slight and flimsy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sadly, the songs here are slight and flimsy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sadly, the songs here are slight and flimsy.

auth_sentence.content: Initially, only a slight ache may be felt.
auth_sentence.res_content: Initially, only a slight ache may be felt.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Initially, only a slight ache may be felt.

auth_sentence.content: She'd a slight squint in her left eye.
auth_sentence.res_content: She'd a slight squint in her left eye.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She'd a slight squint in her left eye.

means.word_mean: 微小的, 轻微的, 微不足道的

sentences.en: The difference is so slight, that I can hardly see it.
sentences.cn: 差别很小, 我几乎看不出来。

means.word_mean: 不结实的, 纤弱的; 脆弱的

sentences.en: The wind seemed to lift her slight body.
sentences.cn: 风似乎要把她瘦弱的身体吹起来。

means.word_mean: 轻蔑, 忽视; 冷落

sentences.en: I'm afraid he took your remark as a slight on his work.
sentences.cn: 恐怕他把你的话当作是对他工作的一种轻蔑。

means.word_mean: 轻蔑, 忽视, 怠慢

jushi.english: There's a slight damage to your car, so you can easily get it repaired.
jushi.chinese: 你的车只有轻微的损坏,你找人修好很容易的。

jushi.english: The wind seemed to lift her slight body.
jushi.chinese: 风似乎要把她瘦弱的身体吹起来。
